channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024020266
item.description:
Report X-2024020266

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler notified manager of leaking hazmat. Manager notified QA. Leaking hazmat was secured in plastic lined tote by QA wearing gloves and a mask. DescribePack: Bottom of plastic bottle cracked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA removed leaking hazmat from area, secured package in QA Hazmat cage.
